website_summaries.verdict: Gift basket includes 4 Creole-style hot sauces and recipes.
pros: Sauces are more about flavor than numbing your taste buds
Perfect balance of spice and heat makes these sauces worth consuming
cons: Overall taste mediocre and watery to some

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these to use for White Elephant gift changes during Christmas time. They weren't the BEST gift, but there was always one or 2 people who liked spicy foods and wanted it. It was good for the price range. Speaking of, immediately after, I found similar items at Walmart for half the price. DARN. One of the people that took it home said he liked it, but it wasn't super spicy. It was still fun for his group of friends to try and compare though. Would I buy it again? Sure, if I had a friend who liked hot sauce and trying new things. Not something I'd buy and keep around the house regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hot for this set of hot sauces
customer_reviews.text: I got this set as a Christmas gift for my brother who is a hot sauce devotee... The moment he saw what it was, his eyes lit up like the Christmas lights on the tree... It send he knew the sauce, as he'd seen it featured on a TV program somewhere. I checked in with him last week and he'd had a chance to use one of the sauces on some wings. Needless to say, he was thrilled and overjoyed in a way only a crazy hot sauce lover can be! I'm totally grateful to you guys for putting this set together and at such a great price. You made the giver and the receiver both very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Looney2ne

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is SO good! The other day I ended up just putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. I bought this for my husband for Christmas because he loves zombie stories and hot sauce. I selected this box based on the fact that everyone talked about the actual flavor. Let me tell you what, I am not a hot sauce fan but HOLY COW, this stuff is SO good! The other day I ended up just putting it on some crackers just to have an excuse to have some. It's good on everything. Worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the hot sauce lover
customer_reviews.text: These hot sauces are a best seller for a reason - they are DELICIOUS. I absolutely love these hot sauces. If you are not sure about investing nearly $30 for hot sauce, I recommend making the plunge. It will make a drastic difference in the taste, in the best way possible. The containers are a little on the small side but you don't need much to get full flavor. This is also a wonderful company to order from. The founder genuinely cares about what customers think about his product.
customer_reviews.author: Stinger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce !
customer_reviews.text: These hot sauces are awesome. The packaging is something to look forward to and definitely appreciate the effort they put into the packaging. It’s cool to keep around and also catches the buyers attention. I bought this item for my spouse because I am not much of a hot sauce person. He loves the hot sauces and varieties it comes with. I would definitely recommend these sauces to someone in need of something new and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: My son was very excited to get this for Christmas. However, he only used each flavor one time and then had to stop because he started breaking out horribly around his mouth, which had never happened with hot sauces before. He is pretty bummed that he didn't get to finish his gift, but said the flavors were good. Just bre careful if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Otto

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Sauce
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce for my son-in-law for Christmas. The item arrived on time and it was securely packaged and the presentation was very professional. We all tried the garlic flavor hot sauce on Christmas day and we really enjoyed it. My son-in-law liked the sauce so I am very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nien-Chin Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice complexity and versatility
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband, who loves spicy foods. He did a straight up taste test of each sauce on its own before trying on food. He enjoyed all the sauces, but particularly liked the CAJUN LAGNIAPPE for its flavor profile. He's been experimenting adding the different sauces to various dishes, including homemade salsa (in which he used two of the sauces and it was the best salsa we've ever made; the Zombie sauces added extra depth and just the right amount of heat). It's been a lot of fun. The Zombie sauces are probably going to be a permanent addition to our home pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kick
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for any occasion! Louisiana style hot sauce is the best and you get four types of hot sauce to keep the zombies away. Comes with a book as well! My favorites are the garlic dual protection and lagniappe hot sauce. Just enough kick to get your blood flowing and flavor to compliment wings, BBQ, pulled pork (yum!), sauces, even your morning eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Amelio

customer_reviews.title: The added garlic rounds the flavor nicely, I'm a big fan of garlic
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining theme for these sauces, but let's get down to business! Core/base sauce: Watery/vinegary base, half as spicy as Tabasco, and half as flavorful as Tapatio. Requires a fair bit of dumping out onto your food to get an adequate taste. Garlic: The added garlic rounds the flavor nicely, I'm a big fan of garlic. Unfortunately it is the same base as above, which requires more than a dash to get the flavor. Needs to coat the food. Lagniappe: Base sauce plus a sweet barbeque sauce "The Antidote" - extra spicy: Spicier, but also smells sweeter. Does not end up tasting twice as spicy, more like 50% spicier.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Orbs

customer_reviews.title: Its more vinegary than hot and spicy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who genuinely enjoys really hot and spicy foods.. she wasn't impressed with this. The flavors are okay, I'm assuming you can even use them to add flavor to regular food. But as far as being super spicy, it disappointed. The flavor of vinegar is strong. It's a cute idea, but definitely not for people who like spicy sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Hot, Hot!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. 1st, the packaging is great, I decided to keep the box and the included book. He likes the fact that the hotness of each sauce is rated from 1-10 on the side of each bottle. My husband has opened all 4 bottles and tried them all as soon as they arrived! Great hot sauce!!!! The anti-dote lives up to it's reputation, be warned...1 drop will do it!!! Great product, got here quickly, will definitely be buying more for gifts when my brother-in-law visits from New Orleans!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift set for someone who likes it spicy
customer_reviews.text: Got them in quick and well packaged so there was no damage to the box or bottles. My boyfriend likes the taste of the one so well he hasnt moved on to the others yet. I like that they say right on the bottle about level of spiciness so I know in advance how much to prepare for flaming mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Free

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Great sauces. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me for Christmas. The flavors are great, especially the original. The lore behind the sauces makes it more fun to eat. That may sound childish, but I enjoyed reading the story first, then eating the sauce... Gotta do it that way to fully appreciate it. I found a new favorite sauce from the experience. I'd highly recommend. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roseboro

customer_reviews.title: every flavor was so amazing I especially loved the antedote
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot sauce for my husband for Christmas and he still can't stop talking about it .... every flavor was so amazing I especially loved the antedote .... so many levels of flavor... if u like really hot stuff like me... there was one flavor that was sooo hot... too hot hot for me ... great for marinades they even send u a recipe book... unfortunately mine got lost in the Christmas commotion but if u guys send me another I'm sure your recipes will be amazing ... I love cooking ... I love hot sauce and I'm definetly not ever going back to tapatio after zombie Cajun... no vinegar after taste here ... just zombie deliciosness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Variety!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun gift! We loved reading the story included about how the sauces came to be. The hot sauces are definitely delicious! Not all of them are too hot but you do get a nice kick out of each one and you can combine for different flavors! Our family really likes hot sauce so this is a great addition to our meals!
customer_reviews.author: Betty R

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste and the idea
customer_reviews.text: For good or bad, the bottles are plastic. The label does not say it needs refrigeration which is a plus in my book, since I can just leave it out on the table like any sensible Louisiana native. The flavors are unique enough to give these sauces characteristic flair while not being too strange to scare away regular hot sauce users. I normally prefer regular red, cayenne pepper sauce but this product adds a good flavor which I would reach for again. The name is unique and the background story is excellent albeit somewhat brief. Think somewhere between Franks and Tabasco with a mild flavor boost. Not real hot.
customer_reviews.author: Loffer Foods

customer_reviews.title: Husband Approved 👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in December as a Christmas gift for my husband because he loves hot sauce. I swear, he loves hot sauce so much, he puts on everything and sweats like crazy because of it. Anyways, back to the product. I haven't tried it personally because I'm not a fan of hot sauce but my husband loves it. He said the flavors are great and loves the variety of it.
customer_reviews.author: Xantea Gunlicks

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the COOLEST gift, and my dad loved it. However, he took them to work for his lunch and tapped on the bottom of one, and the bottle just busted in his hands and made a huge mess. Maybe a fluke. But I don't think I'd want plastic that can break that easily holding any food product.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Even if you don't like zombies, you'll love this hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: My husband expects this set in his Christmas stocking every year! Lucky for me, he shares. We put these on everything. They're so flavorful and only one has a true "oh sh*t" fire to it and that one we utilize for our gumbos, mainly. We happen to think the zombie theme is a lot of fun, but even if that's not your thing, these are terrific hot sauces!
customer_reviews.author: NattyRey

customer_reviews.title: I add this to allot of what I cook to bump it up without adding salt!
customer_reviews.text: Adds flavor and keeps me from salting food too much. Nice subtle base flavors in these! Haven't tried the super hot one yet!!! Get em... use them ... and ENJOY them! Would make a great gift to those who enjoying cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: no respect
customer_reviews.text: im pretty sure i have left one review and im still seething over the wasted product and money. it was a christmas gift that looked like someone stabbed it. obviously with the thin puncture wounds in the bottle someone did ! we had to keep the bottles in the box because they leaked everywhere!! -2 star rating. AND i couldnt find away to return the janky ass bottles so i was stuck with them. still sitting on top of my fridge collecting dust. the flavors were not hot either . no respect
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Zombie hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: All of the flavors are good but the garlic flavor is my daughter and I favorite. We liked it so much that I'm getting ready to order some of just the garlic flavor. I definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Tondalier Read-Books

customer_reviews.title: Great hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: This hot sauce is awesome! The hotter ones are really hot, but taste so good! The packaging is also awesome. These would also be a good gift. I like how the hotness meter is on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hecke

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loved it. He likes the flavors. The spice levels varies and the he says the hottest is plenty hot for him. The packaging is really nice and gives info on each flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JTanner

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute idea, but the flavor is very vinegary. I got these for my husband who loves hot sauce, and we haven't gone through one bottle of them. Only giving it 3 stars for the cute idea it is.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: A Spice You Won’t Want To Miss
customer_reviews.text: My dad looooved these. As a warning, not all of them are deathly spicy (which I think is a good thing). But the packaging is super cute and “manly”. Also, just overall a wonderful gift for someone who loves to collect and taste good hot sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the husband who likes hot sauce. He found the 10/10 to actually be very hot (nearly the hottest sauce he's had), and his favorite flavor is the hot BBQ flavor. Success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift set.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift, to my brother, a lover of hot sauces. He loved them all.. but I noticed when I saw him over the weekend that the Lagniappe is almost half way gone already! :P I tried a little bit of that one and it has a delicious flavor. I will most likely, at least, purchase the Lagniappe again. So glad I found your Zombie hot sauces.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTornado

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad... he absolutely loves it Especially the garlic hot sauce I think it's almost gone. Been making chili 3 times a month and loves to add this for greater flavor - he never even really cooked much till I bought him this set. It is a medium temp and not overpowering in the hot area it actually adds great flavor to what your cooking with just enough zing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok....
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend and I thought the packaging was kinda lame. I would rate all of the sauces as "ok". Not super impressed with any of it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Ccool hot sauces!
customer_reviews.text: The other 5 star reviews are accurate! I recently bought these for my Dad for a fathers day gift, he loved them all, however the Zombie Cajun Garlic sauce was by far his favorite. As far as the "heat" or spiciness goes, he is a fan of hotter sauces but said that none of them were over the top hot and that the hottest "Antidote" was hot but still bearable while being tasty, not like some sauces that are hot just for the sake of being extreme and miss on the taste category. This turned out to be an awesome buy plus the Zombie packaging/labeling is such a great idea and super cool to top it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not made with real brains.
customer_reviews.text: As a total snob when it comes to hot sauces, so I really expected this to be more of a novelty than anything else. I am very pleasantly surprised. All four sauces are very good and have interesting and complex flavors. The hottest sauce. called "The Antidote" has plenty of heat to satisfy hot food lovers. It certainly won't put anyone in the hospital, but it makes Franks Red Extra Hot taste like milk in comparison. Even just for the novelty it was worth it. The fact that the sauces are actually really good, that was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Topper

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Cool Gift
customer_reviews.text: This product came quickly and in a nice box, I received an email to confirm the delivery from the company, which was very nice. When I responded I got a personalized reply and I have to say the customer service is down right amazing. The art work is wicked cool, and will definitely be put on display, even after the bottles are empty. The smell was very nice, and they are packed with flavor. The garlic hot sauce made some OUT OF THIS WORLD jerky flavoring. I have to say overall, this was an amazing product and service and will definitely be back for more. Thank you for all your hard work and dedication!
customer_reviews.author: Koala Steve

customer_reviews.title: Somethig for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loved it. I was surprised because there was something for everyone. The package includes four types of hot sauce ranging from very mild to piping hot. The kit also came with an amusing little story and a free downloadable cookbook. We will definitely be purchasing this kit again for our friends and family members. We will also be exploring their other products because it is now our favorite brand of hot sauce.
customer_reviews.author: amie langemo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my son at Christmas a couple years ago, I just forgot to put this review. He loved ever single flavor and ate them up
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged, not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item as a gift but unfortunately it arrived damaged. One of the sauces appears to have leaked and there is dried sauce on the outside of the bottle as well as the white part of the box. Not a big deal if I had ordered for myself, but not gift-able in my opinion. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to fellow hot sauce enthusiasts. Probs should have gotten myself one. They love it so far....still waiting on someone to share :-(
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Heated!!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt, the most flavorful, delicious hot sauce I've ever had in my life. I've gotten my daughter and her fiance eating it or cooking with it every night, and as for me, I put it on practically everything. I have to admit, when I sent the first variety 4 pack to my daughter as a gift, I selected it because of the name and her annual "zombie pub crawl" at Halloween. But this has become Numero Uno for all of us now: IT'S JUST THAT FREAKING GOOD, even if you're not a Zombie!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: They taste so good
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for new year. He loves hot sauces. And he loves these a lot! The box is cool - very nice gift option.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: This hot sauce is all the hype but not the flavor. I like the design of the kit and the little booklet but the sauce is just not that great and watered and vinegared down too much.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Alison

customer_reviews.title: Had been used. Broken seal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I didn't open it before I gifted it. One bottle had a missing seal and the amount of hot sauce was lower than other sealed bottles. It looks like someone had sampled and returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful Spice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as gift for my husband who is a lover of hotsauce. I must say that all the previous reviews on this were right. These sauces - especially the cajun and garlic hot sauce - are so full of wonderful flavor. These sauces aren't about getting the hottest sauce and burn in your mouth, they are about providing wonderful flavor to compliment the meal you making. We will buying more of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lutya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved the presentation perfect to give as a gift. Flavors are good however common to what you would get in any gift set like this. I found the bottles to be of good size however fragile. Did not survive a drop off of the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fun and delicious set of hot sauces
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift, but since I'm married to the recipient, I benefit too! We started using these a week or so ago, and are now putting one or the other or the other on almost everything we eat. There truly is something for everyone here - from mild to hot (but not too hot...it's not as hot as the ghost pepper sauce we've had and I can't even try). My favorite is the thick lagniappe style - very mild but sooo flavorful. The garlic infused sauce was great on home made Indian food. Not hugely hot but lots of flavor. Also fun packaging and a good time to taste each one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Hot And Tasty
customer_reviews.text: To me these are very hot. Which is exactly what I wanted. Very good flavor. I would give 5 stars but they all (except one) pretty much taste the same. Still worth the price and I do recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Luckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Reviews, Great Hot Sauce!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of or had this brand before, but went for it based on all of the great Amazon reviews. Boy was that a good call. These sauces have a good variety of heat and flavor. The mildest one is almost kind of sweet and the hottest one has some heat (but is maybe not as burning fire as I expected from a 10/10 on the "hot scale" they claimed). Overall these exceeded my expectations and have been delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Son-in-law loves!
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loves trying hot sauces, and he loves zombie movies ... so this was the perfect Christmas gift for him!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Average at best.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging, marketing, little book etc., we're cool and all, but when I buy hot sauce, I want "hot" sauce. All we're very mild. I find that all too common with U.S. made hot sauces. If I wanted tobasco, I would have bought tobasco. At least the darker/richer one of the four had great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Perry B.

customer_reviews.title: Zombie Hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: I got the hot sauce package I love the box and the comic book. I just got finished taste testing them and I love them the zombie Cajun was like your typical hot sauce, the antidote had some kick that I wasn't ready for but liked it for the heat it had not to much but enough to to let you know it was there. The garlic and lagniappe taste great I will be taking all of them out to sea with me to share with the guys at work and will probably order another set again overall I was satisfied with the taste and packaging, my order shipped the very next day and was here within two days.
customer_reviews.author: snax

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to spice up food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of really fun zombie-themed hot sauce for my boyfriend who really loves putting hot sauce on practically everything! I got to try them all except the antidote one which is supposed to be the hottest one (boyfriend says just one drop was enough as far as heat). They all have a slight similar taste of vinegar but that also adds good flavor to food. Our favorite was the garlic one. Overall a very fun gift!
customer_reviews.author: The_Rox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. This product is from a family business and they made an effort to reach out to me and ensure my shipment arrived okay and also reached out to me to let me know that they are committed to their customers. I didn't get to taste the sauce as it was a gift, but the recipient was very excited about this and couldn't wait to try it.
customer_reviews.author: AM508

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and husband are major hot sauce fan. These didn’t disappoint, they use them almost every meal
customer_reviews.author: Jumpup2019

customer_reviews.title: Some great flavors and not too spicy
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are some great hot sauces that can be used on just about anything. None of the sauces are overly hot, even the extra hot sauce is not very spicy. The garlic sauce is great on eggs and chicken; it has the classic vinegar spiciness that is common in Louisiana style sauces with just a hint of garlic. The Lagniappe sauce is actually my personal favorite; this one is loaded with flavors and has been awesome on everything I have put it on. I would definitely recommend set to anyone who wants to try some hot sauces that add a little spiciness from variations of classic Louisiana hot sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter87

customer_reviews.title: Got to love a spicy Zombie!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the Zombie Hot Sauce! I got this gift for someone else for Christmas. We pulled it out for dinner and dabbed it on our ham. We tried each flavor and what a wonderful experience. The 4 different sauces ranged from mildly hot to pretty hot! The variety of spiciness was great because not everyone is able to tolerate true spice. Our favorite was the garlic sauce. It had a lovely flavor and a mild spice.Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Shannen

customer_reviews.title: Zombie & hot sauce fans will like this set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an upcoming birthday gift. It's a pretty neat gift set and I know he will like it. When it arrived, I took a quick look on the inside and I didn't see this so called zombie gift book (which is listed to be included with this set) unless it's hidden underneath the bottles of hot sauce. Otherwise, the shipping was very quick and as I said, it's an awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby for Christmas and he is obsessed, gonna have to purchase more soon, flavors are amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorG

customer_reviews.title: Whoaaaaa! 🔥!!!
customer_reviews.text: Packed with firey flavors! I enjoy them all being a HOT sauce lover😋 Great price and interesting packaging and you get a free recipe booklet. Worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! This was a gift for my husband who ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! This was a gift for my husband who loves spicy and hot things. He is very happy with this set. A nice combination of different levels of heat. He also said that the flavor is great, its not just crazy hot to the point that you don't also enjoy the flavor. He pulls these out regularly trying different flavors on different meals. He's mentioned more then once that we can feel free to get him more as a gift anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Peron

customer_reviews.title: Fishy and not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Not much heat and they all have a fishy taste to them. Kinda bummed because I read so many good reviews

I started with an addiction to the garlic but love love the antidote too, lan-yap is perfect for eggs Benedict and honestly the original makes for a kick ass beef Jerky!!! I also loved the added little short story that came with it! I Love your stuff!!! This was my third order!

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for gifts for my Dad and brother who are very much into hot sauces and they loved them. I had one arrive with a leak and customer service rushed me a replacement right away and checked to make sure I received it and was happy with it. Great company, great customer service and great products. 10/10 will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great Sauces
customer_reviews.text: Despite some minor reluctancy to buy these because I feared they were mainly just going to be a concept pushed item, I got these hot sauces as a gift for my sister for Christmas. Of course she loved them, they have zombies all over them, but the sauces were actually great! Each one is pretty different from the last and went great with my Christmas Steak. The concept idea also goes further than the box, my sister truly enjoyed what the brand had to offer. Oh, and the customer service was some of the best I have received here on Amazon. A must buy for zombie and hot sauce fans!

customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for sister boyfriend who loves Hot Sause. Was a huge hit. Thanks

customer_reviews.text: I get as gifts every person wanted to know where I get it I could not say a lay

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gift Set, Ok Hot Sauce
customer_reviews.text: There was a good variety of hot sauces in this pack, ranging from sweet and tangy, to garlicky, to quite spicy. None of them really stood out as exceptional though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great tastes
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of everything. My bf and I love it. The flavors are fantastic. Love the spicy garlic
customer_reviews.author: DMonster

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the zombie story In the book, the hot sauce have their own unique flavors, I like the garlic on popcorn and cant wait to try some of the recipes especially the etouffee
customer_reviews.author: terrie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty sauces & great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought the gift set for my boyfriend who loves hot sauces. Here's what he's said about them: "The Antidote": it's tasty and not too hot that you can't get the flavor. He's really into hot spices but he really likes that he can taste the flavor. "Zombie Cajun hot sauce": It's like a more flavorful tabasco. "Garlic": He would enjoy this with chicken and on sandwiches "Hot pepper sauce": He really liked the consistency in that it's thicker. It's sort of a paste and it's smokey to him. Overall he thinks they're all really delicious. He'd like to know if you have anything hotter (glutton for punishment) and anything with a thick consistency like the hot pepper sauce?
